title: What is the relationship between quantum physics and ancient knowledge in the pursuit of transcending time?
first_phrase: This text explores the relationship between ancient knowledge and modern science, focusing on the concept of time. The author references prominent philosophers and scientists, including Arturo Reghini and Paul Davies, to illustrate the idea that time is a more complex and mysterious phenomena than we may have previously understood. The text also delves into the idea of the Great Work or Grande Opera, which involves transcending time and achieving a higher state of consciousness. Through this discussion, the author suggests that ancient wisdom and modern science can inform and complement each other in our understanding of the universe and our place in it.

last_phrase: In conclusion, symbols have the power to connect us to a higher reality and help us transcend the limitations of our everyday lives. By understanding and working with symbols, we can access deeper levels of consciousness and achieve personal transformation. Whether through physical exercises or mental meditations, the opus circulare and other traditions offer practical ways to incorporate symbolic thinking into our lives and tap into the energy of the universe.
